description: This file sets up Express.js routes for note management in a backend API. It defines endpoints for CRUD operations on notes, including listing all notes, retrieving a specific note, creating, updating, and deleting notes. The routes utilize middleware for authentication and delegate request handling to controller functions. Swagger annotations document the API for automatic documentation generation.

methods.name: listNotes
methods.description: Handles retrieval of all notes for an authenticated user

methods.name: getNote
methods.description: Handles retrieval of a specific note by ID

methods.name: createNewNote
methods.description: Handles creation of a new note

methods.name: updateExistingNote
methods.description: Handles updating an existing note by ID

methods.name: deleteExistingNote
methods.description: Handles deletion of a note by ID
